short_summary: Informatics Professional and Consulting Services, Requirements, Analysis, Feasibility Studies
full_summary:
# Cancelled Government Tender Notice
## Introduction

The following tender notice has been cancelled by Natural Resources Canada.

### Tender Details

| Field                        | Value                     |
|-------------------------------|---------------------------|
| Tender Number                 | NRCan- 5000068423         |
| Solicitation Number           | NRCan- 5000068423         |
| Publication Date              | November 9, 2022          |
| Tender Closure Date           | December 9, 2022, 14:00   |
| Trade Agreements              | Various (see below)       |
| Regions of Opportunity        | Canada                    |
| Regions of Delivery           | Canada                    |

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact:

Michaud, Marie-Josee
Phone: (418) 563-6916
Email: marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
Address: 1055, rue du P.E.P.S., Québec, QC G1V 4C7, Canada

### Notice

This notice is no longer active and is subject to cancellation. No further updates or action will be taken.
